docs.lead_paragraph: A Florida man who admitted to tricking his pregnant girlfriend into taking pills known to cause abortion has been ordered to serve more than 13 years in federal prison and to pay her about $28,500 in restitution, U.S. prosecutors said.

headline.main: Florida Man Who Tricked Girlfriend to Take Abortion Pill Gets 13 Years
headline.print_headline: Florida Man Who Tricked Girlfriend to Take Abortion Pill Gets 13 Years

docs.snippet: A Florida man who admitted to tricking his pregnant girlfriend into taking pills known to cause abortion has been ordered to serve more than 13 years in federal prison and to pay her about $28,500 in restitution, U.S. prosecutors said.

docs.lead_paragraph: Having watched several promising campaigns collapse in 2012 after candidates made catastrophic mistakes, national Republican leaders are leaving nothing to chance as they prepare for this year's midterm elections.

docs.lead_paragraph: Arizona moved Monday to implement new abortion rules limiting the use of the most common abortion-inducing drug and requiring doctors to have admitting privileges at a nearby hospitals.

docs.lead_paragraph: Trial began on Monday for a Massachusetts woman accused of killing her pregnant friend, cutting the fetus out of her body and attempting to pass off the baby as her own.

docs.lead_paragraph: The husband of a pregnant, brain-dead Texas woman who was taken off life support over the weekend named what would have been the couple's second child before his wife was removed from machines.

headline.main: Brain-Dead Pregnant Woman's Husband Names Fetus
headline.print_headline: Brain-Dead Pregnant Woman's Husband Names Fetus

docs.snippet: The husband of a pregnant, brain-dead Texas woman who was taken off life support over the weekend named what would have been the couple's second child before his wife was removed from machines.

docs.lead_paragraph: Officials across the country, including Mayor Bill de Blasio of New York, are studying successful programs in New Jersey as they seek to expand access to preschool.

headline.main: Lessons for de Blasio in New Jersey’s Free Pre-K
headline.print_headline: Lessons for de Blasio in New Jersey’s Free Pre-K

docs.abstract: Officials across country, including New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, are studying successful programs in New Jersey as they seek to broaden access to free, full-day prekindergarten; New Jersey programs, which last for two years rather than one, have achieved excellent results, though they are more expensive and intensive than what many officials have proposed.
docs.snippet: Officials across the country, including Mayor Bill de Blasio of New York, are studying successful programs in New Jersey as they seek to expand access to preschool.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Fort Worth hospital followed a judge’s order to remove the brain-dead woman, Marlise Muñoz, from machines, ending a battle that had sparked a debate over abortion and end-of-life care.

headline.main: Texas Woman Is Taken Off Life Support After Order
headline.print_headline: Texas Woman Is Taken Off Life Support After Order

docs.abstract: Fort Worth hospital that kept a pregnant, brain-dead woman on life support for two months follows a judge’s order and removes her from the machines, ending her family’s legal fight to have her pronounced dead and to challenge a Texas law that prohibits medical officials from cutting off life support to a pregnant woman.
docs.snippet: The Fort Worth hospital followed a judge’s order to remove the brain-dead woman, Marlise Muñoz, from machines, ending a battle that had sparked a debate over abortion and end-of-life care.
